Display Value: About 30% of the expenditure in residential facilities for care of the aged has a health purpose, but this is difficult to estimate routinely and so is not included under health at present. Such health-purpose expenditure was about US$ 2.1 billion in 2005–2006 or 0.2% of GDP.

Out-of-pocket expenditure figures from the NHA report have been estimated from the Sierra Leone Integrated Household Survey (SLIHS) 2004. Because the SLIHS 2010 had been conducted but not yet analysed, the 2004 figures had to be increased according to inflation to provide a best estimate.
